Class TopicController

  • java.lang.Object
    • the.nss.boys.blog.rest.TopicController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/topics")
public class TopicController
extends java.lang.Object
    Rest controller for Topics Creates, Reads, Edits and Deletes data via Http requests
